name: Keep The Lights On (Nelis)
description:
Welcome to keep the lights on a game where you need to survive the night

this horror game is played with headset and absolute silence

windows will open, lights will turn off or be broken, and you will be stared at by the monster

get out of bed and point your flashlight on the ground to show your walkable path

when a light breaks grab a new light bulb off of your desk

WASD - movement

escape - get out of bed, window

c - show controls (only when out of bed)

space - hide under blanket (in bed), close window

g - close eyes(in bed)

left mouse - interact (on objects)
